channel.title: Positioning sprites in my client
channel.description:
Well, I was wondering where I would go in my client folder to change the position of my sprites? Here's a pic of what it looks like as of now; also that the ones the do work are the ones that aren't put together:
[img]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/77/positioningsprites.png[/img]
Reason being for blackening the chatbox out is because I don't want people seeing what is there yet. You see how the white letters as well as green aren't where they are supposed to be; they're too far up and same thing with the sprites for the friend's list and such. How would I position them so that they actually become centered and fit well? Help much appreciated.

item.title: Positioning sprites in my client
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Well, I was wondering where I would go in my client folder to change the position of my sprites? Here’s a pic of what it looks like as of now; also that the ones the do work are the ones that aren’t put together:

Reason being for blackening the chatbox out is because I don’t want people seeing what is there yet. You see how the white letters as well as green aren’t where they are supposed to be; they’re too far up and same thing with the sprites for the friend’s list and such. How would I position them so that they actually become centered and fit well? Help much appreciated.
